name: Spider Rope Hero vs. Mutant
description: Spider Rope Hero is one of the best actions and free game which allow you to fly for saving your girlfriend which is kidnapped by a mutant. A superhero is an iron-made hero with superhero powers and forces. Which allows you to fly and swing with the help of spider rope and jumping on the different buildings to catch kidnappers and evils persons. You can fly in the beautiful animated city environment. Mutant kidnappers kidnaped spider rope hero girlfriend in a car. Now the challenge of the game is to save girl from the mutant spider rope hero. For saving a girl, you can fly using spider rope and you can also fight with a kidnapper to save the girl. Enjoy the multiple features in one game. You can fly and jump, feel like spider hero game and also fight with kidnappers.
